The Steam Machine looks like it could shake up the gaming world, its price is GIANT Secret! We build a DIY Steam Machine to help educate our guess on the cost, comparing its AMD RDNA3 GPU and Zen 4 CPU specs to gaming PCs and consoles like the PS5. title: The STEAM Machine Won't Cost What You Think
